record.creatorPhotographer: Bud Daley and Ray Burly; Chicago Daily News Weekend
record.description: Singing a show song, "We'd Rather Go to The Movies" and rehearsing Dr. Coolidge's satire on the University of Chicago Great Books course are, left to right: Lee Wilcox, educational broadcasting department; Coolidge; Phoebe Torrance, fifth grade teacher, University Lab School; and Ray Lubway, Britannica Junior editor assistant.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
